RelatedSentence: Acting Battalion Chief Monty Nye tells 6 News , It is somewhat of a inconvienece to our members and the crews just trying to coordinate everything .
But lots of rain over the last week has now forced them to move back -- since their trucks ca n't get through the water .
Nye adds , It 's just another reason why the temporary one is n't best for us but it will work right now until we get the permenent station in .
